overview:
Interpolation tags are used to integrate dynamic content into the template.

The tag's content MUST be a non-whitespace character sequence NOT containing
the current closing delimiter.

This tag's content names the data to replaceÂ the tag.  A single period (`.`)
indicates that the item currently sitting atop the context stack should be
used; otherwise, name resolution is as follows:
  1) Split the name on periods; the first part is the name to resolve, any
  remaining parts should be retained.
  2) Walk the context stack from top to bottom, finding the first context
  that is a) a hash containing the name as a key OR b) an object responding
  to a method with the given name.
  3) If the context is a hash, the data is the value associated with the
  name.
  4) If the context is an object, the data is the value returned by the
  method with the given name.
  5) If any name parts were retained in step 1, each should be resolved
  against a context stack containing only the result from the former
  resolution.  If any part fails resolution, the result should be considered
  falsey, and should interpolate as the empty string.
Data should be coerced into a string (and escaped, if appropriate) before
interpolation.

The Interpolation tags MUST NOT be treated as standalone.

tests.name: No Interpolation
tests.desc: Mustache-free templates should render as-is.

tests.name: Basic Interpolation
tests.desc: Unadorned tags should interpolate content into the template.

tests.name: no HTML Escaping
tests.desc: Basic interpolation should not be HTML escaped.
tests.template: These characters should not be HTML escaped: {{forbidden}}
tests.expected: These characters should not be HTML escaped: & " < >

tests.name: Triple Mustache
tests.desc: Triple mustaches should interpolate without HTML escaping.
tests.template: These characters should not be HTML escaped: {{{forbidden}}}
tests.expected: These characters should not be HTML escaped: & " < >

tests.name: Ampersand
tests.desc: Ampersand should interpolate without HTML escaping.
tests.template: These characters should not be HTML escaped: {{&forbidden}}
tests.expected: These characters should not be HTML escaped: & " < >

tests.name: Basic Integer Interpolation
tests.desc: Integers should interpolate seamlessly.

tests.name: Triple Mustache Integer Interpolation
tests.desc: Integers should interpolate seamlessly.

tests.name: Ampersand Integer Interpolation
tests.desc: Integers should interpolate seamlessly.

tests.name: Basic Decimal Interpolation
tests.desc: Decimals should interpolate seamlessly with proper significance.

tests.name: Triple Mustache Decimal Interpolation
tests.desc: Decimals should interpolate seamlessly with proper significance.

tests.name: Ampersand Decimal Interpolation
tests.desc: Decimals should interpolate seamlessly with proper significance.

tests.name: Dotted Names - Basic Interpolation
tests.desc: Dotted names should be considered a form of shorthand for sections.

tests.name: Dotted Names - Triple Mustache Interpolation
tests.desc: Dotted names should be considered a form of shorthand for sections.

tests.name: Dotted Names - Ampersand Interpolation
tests.desc: Dotted names should be considered a form of shorthand for sections.

tests.name: Dotted Names - Arbitrary Depth
tests.desc: Dotted names should be functional to any level of nesting.

tests.name: Dotted Names - Initial Resolution
tests.desc: The first part of a dotted name should resolve as any other name.

tests.name: Interpolation - Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Interpolation should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Triple Mustache - Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Interpolation should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Ampersand - Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Interpolation should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Interpolation - Standalone
tests.desc: Standalone interpolation should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Triple Mustache - Standalone
tests.desc: Standalone interpolation should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Ampersand - Standalone
tests.desc: Standalone interpolation should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Interpolation With Padding
tests.desc: Superfluous in-tag whitespace should be ignored.

tests.name: Triple Mustache With Padding
tests.desc: Superfluous in-tag whitespace should be ignored.

tests.name: Ampersand With Padding
tests.desc: Superfluous in-tag whitespace should be ignored.

__ATTN__: Do not edit this file; changes belong in the appropriate YAML file.
